segments.text: I observe the woman in the kitchen, her back somewhat to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes stacked on the counter to her right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full, water cascading over the front like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the growing puddle, but her face shows no concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a slovenly way to handle the kitchen, letting it flood like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks ridiculous, teetering for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, probably making crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl just stands there, begging with her palm up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets and a messy floorâ€”it's all so unkempt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window reveals a neat garden, which only highlights the interior filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel repulsed by how unaware and careless they all seem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a disaster waiting to disgust anyone who sees it.
segments.speaker: PAR
